tool.name: Analysis to CSV [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Export a specified table with all annotations from an upstream analysis to a CSV file. Please refer to DUET Documentation for further information.
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "file", "name": "dataframe.csv"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --bool-values Save_as_CSV_File --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.analysis_to_csv_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Analysis
param.label: Upstream Analysis
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis

param.name: Table_to_Export
param.label: Table to Export
param.help: Source table to be exported. Default is Original.

param.name: Save_as_CSV_File
param.label: Save as CSV File
param.help: If True, export the data as a single csv file, otherwise, export the data as a dataset that can be manipulated in NIDAP.

tool.help: **Analysis to CSV [SPAC] [DMAP]** Export a specified table with all annotations from an upstream analysis to a CSV file. Please refer to DUET Documentation for further information. **Outputs:** - dataframe: file (dataframe.csv)
